p: Vasopressors were administered to approximately 0.1% (2/1,413) of the patients in the non-AKI group and 12.7% (9/71) of patients in the AKI group, all of whom were in shock. Fortunately, all patients in the non-AKI group had completely recovered at the time of discharge, whereas death occurred in 9 (12.7%) patients from the AKI group ( Table 3). All of these patients had both liver and respiratory failure and were also in shock during hospitalization. Furthermore, all of the death cases were categorized as DHF grade IV, severe dengue, and AKI stage 3.
